unauthenticated.noAccount: Si vous n'avez pas de compte Formulaires GC,
unauthenticated.title: Se connecter pour accéder aux réponses

card.noResponsesToDownload: There are no responses available to download.[fr]

download.trySelectingLessFiles: Max of {{max}} files can be downloadled at once. Please try selecting less files.[fr]
download.atLeastOneFile: At least one file must be selected to download.[fr]

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. They look like, c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up-to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm, responses are available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.[fr]

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report problems with responses[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that won't download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: The problem will be reported, and someone will contact you with help.[fr]
